Data: Toss: New Zealand have won the toss and will bowl.
Tuffey to Hayden, no run Tuffey hits a good length straight away, pitches on middle and off stump, Hayden gets forward and blocks
Tuffey to Hayden, 1 wide whoa that's wide and going wider, that pitched way outside off stump, angling across Hayden and moved further away
Tuffey to Hayden, 1 run Australia are away, Hayden leans forward and pushes it in front of point for a single
Tuffey to Jaques, no run hits a good length outside off stump and shapes away from Jaques who lets it go
Tuffey to Jaques, no run this one pitches just outside off stump and cuts away from Jaques who once again lets McCullum do the fielding

Tuffey to Jaques, no run ah this time Tuffey bowls it a little wider outside off stump and moves it away from the left-hander, Jaques sees the width and chases the ball with the expansive drive, he misses and was lucky not to nick that
Tuffey to Jaques, 1 run shorter length on off stump, Jaques moves back and dabs it behind point for his first run
Bond to Jaques, no run Jaques chases another one that is wide outside off and moving further away from him, once again he gets beaten
Bond to Jaques, no run Bond bowls a peach, that pitches on off stump and cuts away from Jaques who fends at it outside the off stump, the ball whizzes past the outside edge
Bond to Jaques, no run this one is a little wider outside off stump and Jaques lets it go

Bond to Jaques, OUT Bond strikes, Jaques sees a short ball outside off stump moving away from him and decides to smash it, he goes on the back foot and reaches far out for the ball, the ball hits the toe end of the bat and spoons to Vettori at cover who takes the simplest of catches, perhaps the nerves got to Jaques
Bond to Hayden, 1 wide oh that's very wide, with the movement Bond is getting he can't afford to pitch it that far outside off stump
Bond to Hayden, 1 wide and another, far outside off stump
Bond to Hayden, no run full toss on leg stump, Hayden should have dispatched that to the square leg fence but instead he hits it straight off his pads to Vincent at square leg
Bond to Hayden, no run Bond gets his line right for the last ball, pitches just outside off stump and seams away, Hayden lets it go

Tuffey to Haddin, FOUR runs Haddin gets off the mark in style, Tuffey bowls a full ball on middle and leg, Haddin plays it late and flicks it superbly through midwicket for the first boundary of the innings
Tuffey to Haddin, 2 runs and he times this one superbly through covers on the front foot, the outfield isn't the fastest
Tuffey to Haddin, no run what's he trying here? Haddin charges Tuffey and tries to hit him down the ground, Tuffey bowls it slightly shorter and Haddin gets beaten
Tuffey to Haddin, 1 leg bye Tuffey slips down leg side and Haddin misses the flick, he'll get a leg bye behind square leg
Tuffey to Hayden, FOUR runs classy shot! Tuffey bowls it full on middle stump at 130kmh, Hayden leans forward and punches past mid-on and the ball canters to the fence
Tuffey to Hayden, no run left alone outside the off stump

Bond to Haddin, OUT bowled him! Bond pitches that just outside off stump and the ball swings in a long way, Haddin tries to hit it through the off side and plays all around it, the ball blasts between bat and pad and smashes into the stumps
Bond to Hussey, no run Bond fires it nearly in the blockhole, Hussey digs it out on the leg side
Bond to Hussey, no run good length once again from Bond on off stump, Hussey gets forward and defends towards point
Bond to Hussey, no run short of a length this time, pitched on leg and middle and slanting across the left-hander, Hussey goes on the back foot and defends to the off side
Bond to Hussey, no run a touch fuller on middle and off stump at 143 kmh, Hussey leans forward and defends towards cover
Bond to Hussey, no run bang on a good length outside off stump and shaping away from Hussey who gets his front foot forward and lets it go through to the wicketkeeper
Tuffey to Hayden, no run pitches outside off stump and moves away from Hayden who also lets it go
Tuffey to Hayden, no run good length ball outside off stump, Tuffey is asking Hayden to reach out and play it, Hayden decides to leave it alone
Tuffey to Hayden, 1 run pitches on leg stump and Hayden moves across and flicks it down to fine leg for a single
Tuffey to Hussey, no run fullish length outside off stump, Hussey leans forward and drives to point, six dot balls to Hussey, rather uncharacteristic wouldn't you say?
Tuffey to Hussey, no run pitches just short of alength outside off stump, Hussey plays back and lets it go close to off stump
Tuffey to Hussey, 1 run and he's away, Tuffey drops that a bit shorter on leg stump, Hussey jumps back and tucks it behind square on the leg side for a single
Bond to Hussey, 2 runs guided down to third man for a couple of runs, Hussey got a bit squared up on that occasion
Bond to Hussey, no run good length ball pitching outside off stump and cutting away from Hussey who begins to play at it and then tries to pull his bat out of the way

Bond to Hussey, 1 bye outstanding from Bond! He's been moving everything away from the left hander but this time he cuts it back into Hussey with a scrambled seam, Hussey lets it go and the ball almost shaves off stump, McCullum is also surprised by the movement and concedes a bye
Bond to Hayden, no run fuller length and wider this time, Hayden chases it witha big drive but gets beaten by the movement
Bond to Hayden, no run this time Hayden chooses to let one that moves away from him go through to McCullum

Bond to Hayden, no run short of a length pitching just outside leg stump, Hayden comes forwar dand tries to force it on the leg side, he gets hit on the pad, Bond appeals for leg before but Billy Bowden says nothing doing
Tuffey to Hussey, no run left alone outside off stump
Tuffey to Hussey, no run fuller length outside off stump, Hussey gets forward and defends towards cover
Tuffey to Hussey, no run excellent line and length on middle and off stump, Hussey moves on the front foot and defends back to Tuffey

Tuffey to Hussey, 2 runs short of a length outside off stump, Hussey opens the face and runs it down to third man, Hussey is super quick between the wickets and calls for two, Gillespie's throw from the deep was poor
Tuffey to Hussey, no run good length ball outside off stump, Hussey covers the line of the ball and lets it go
Tuffey to Hussey, no run pitches just short of a length on middle and off stump and pins Hussey on the back foot, defended back to the bowler
Bond to Hayden, no run that pitches on off stump and bounces high, Hayden lifts his bat out of the way and lets it go over the off stump
Bond to Hayden, no run low full toss outside off stump, Hayden gets forward and drives to play the cover drive but gets an inside edge towards midwicket
Bond to Hayden, 1 run good length ball on off stump, Hayden pushes it on the front foot wide of mid-off for a single
Bond to Hussey, 1 run fuller length on leg and middle, Hussey gets squared up by the away movement and gets an outside edge along the ground to third man
Bond to Hayden, no run and we have lift off! Bond bowls that just short of alength outside off stump, that bounced really sharply on Hayden who wisely chose to let it go
Bond to Hayden, no run this one doesn't bounce as much but Hayden once again decides to shoulder arms
Tuffey to Hussey, no run Tuffey pitches this on a good length outside off stump and brings it back into the left-hander, Hussey lets it go through to McCullum
Tuffey to Hussey, no run Hussey moves on the back foot and defends towards cover
Tuffey to Hussey, no run and again, Hussey is leaving balls uncomfortably close to off stump, Tuffey is getting the ball to shape back into the left-hander now, rather than just away from him
Tuffey to Hussey, no run this one moves away from Hussey who gets his front foot across and lets it go
Tuffey to Hussey, 1 run fuller length on leg and middle stump, Hussey plays it to midwicket on the front foot for a single, he didn't time it well enough
Tuffey to Hayden, no run Hayden steps down the pitch but Tuffey sees him coming and drops it a fraction shorter, Hayden ends up defending it on the leg side
Bond to Hussey, no run pitches on a good length on off stump and moves a shade away from Hussey who lets it go once again
Bond to Hussey, no run this time he plays at it but gets beaten by a beautiful delivery that pitches on middle and odd and seams away from Hussey, he was forced to play at that

Bond to Hussey, no run this one is much quicker and it bends back into Hussey who initially comes forward and then has to hop back, the ball hits the inside edge and luckily for Hussey bounces past the stumps
Bond to Hussey, no run Hussey watches one through to McCullum yet again
Bond to Hussey, 1 run justa touch fuller on off stump, Hussey pushes it towards mid-off and calls for the single, Vettori can't cut it off
Bond to Hayden, no run short of a length ball of middle and off pushing Hayden back, he jumps up and defends it down back to Bond

Tuffey to Hussey, FOUR runs Tuffey drops it justa little short, not that short mid you, Hussey gets back into position in a flash and plays a short-arm pull over midwicket, it was more of a clip that a pull, he didn't try to hit it too hard
Tuffey to Hussey, no run Tuffey comes back well with one that pitches outside off stump and moves away from Hussey through to McCullum
Tuffey to Hussey, no run straighter line this tim on off stump, Hussey leans forward and defends to cover
Tuffey to Hussey, no run pushed to covers once again on the front foot
Tuffey to Hussey, no run a shade on the fuller side on off stump, Hussey leans forward and plays it to cover once again
Tuffey to Hussey, no run on a good length outside off stump, Hussey gets his foot to the pitch of the ball and drives ...to cover once more
Bond to Hayden, no run Bond has been impeccable today, he pitches this on off stump and takes it away from Hayden who moves back and lets it go
Bond to Hayden, no run Bond drops it on a shorter length and angles it away from Hayden who tries to pull but gets beaten comprehensively
Bond to Hayden, no run this one pitches outside off stump, keeps a little lower than the others but moves away a great deal off the seam, Hayden lets it go
Bond to Hayden, no run Bond gets closer to off stump but Hayden picks which side the ball is moving and shoulders arms
Bond to Hayden, no run good length ball on middle and off stump, Hayden takes a step down and plays it back to Bond
Bond to Hayden, no run good length once again outside off stump, Hayden tries to drives on the off side but mis-times it to midwicket instead
Oram to Hussey, no run pitches on middle and off and bends back into Hussey who plays back and gets hit high on the pad, Oram appeals for leg before but that was too high
Oram to Hussey, no run played off the pads to short fine leg
Oram to Hussey, no run pitches far outside off stump and continues to move away from Hussey who decides not to play at it
Oram to Hussey, no run good length ball on leg and middle stump, Hussey moves back in his crease and defends back to Oram
Oram to Hussey, 1 run this one bounces a bit more on Hussey on of stump, he handles it well by playing it with soft hands down to third man
Oram to Hayden, no run the frustration is getting to Hayden, he takes a step down the pitch and tries to wallop that down the ground, the ball moves away from him and misses the bat by a long way
Gillespie to Hussey, no run pitches on leg and middle stump, Hussey gets forward and defends to the leg side
Gillespie to Hussey, no run loud lodu appeal for lbw but that pitched outside leg stump even though it was going to hit middle, Hussey tried to flick but missed it and got rapped on the pad
Gillespie to Hussey, no run pitches short of a length outside off stump, Hussey lets this one go through to McCullum
Gillespie to Hussey, no run fuller length on off stump, Hussey gets on to the front foot and plays it to mid-off
Gillespie to Hussey, FOUR runs outstanding timing and placement, the ball wasn't poor at all, perhaps a touch too full, Hussey leans forward and carresses it through covers for four
Gillespie to Hussey, 1 run this time he pushes it to the left of Jacob Oram at point and sets off for a sharp single, smart running
Oram to Hussey, 1 run short of a length on leg stump, Hussey tucks it off his hips for a single to square leg
Oram to Hayden, 1 run short of alength again but outside off stump this time, Hayden runs it down to third man
Oram to Hussey, no run excellent line and length bang on off stump, Hussey trusts the bounce and lets it go over the top of off stump
Oram to Hussey, no run good leave, Hussey gets a stride in and lets it go close to off stump
Oram to Hussey, no run a replay of the previous ball, Oram keeps it tight outside off stump and brings it back into Hussey just a little, Hussey moves back and lets it go
Oram to Hussey, no run this time he plays at it and gets beaten, lovely stuff from Oram, he moved that away from Hussey unlike the previous ones that came back in to him
Gillespie to Hayden, no run fullish length on off stump, Hayden thumps it to cover off the front foot but Vincent moves quickly to his left and dives to save runs
Gillespie to Hayden, no run Hayden tries to heave it down the ground once again but gets an inside edge to midwicket
Gillespie to Hayden, no run Hayden tries to cut this one but it moves away from him and he gets beaten, he's really struggling to find his touch

Gillespie to Hayden, FOUR runs well he's touched that! Hayden moves down the track and picks the full length ball, he swings that big bat of his and send sthe ball over midwicket even though he didn't time that perfectly
Gillespie to Hayden, 1 run Hayden tries to cut again but it's too close to him, he gets a bottom edge on the off side for a single
Gillespie to Hussey, no run Hussey judges it well and lets it go close to off stump
Oram to Hayden, no run pitches outside leg stump and angles across Hayden, he tries to move acroos his stumps and play it to square leg but misses and gets hit on the pad
Oram to Hayden, no run Hayden steps down the track once more but realises that he was in no position at all, he almost gave up on the shot half-way and Oram goes straight through him
Oram to Hayden, no run Oram drops it a fraction short and Hayden cuts and cuts hard, he hits it straight to Taylor at point
Oram to Hayden, no run good line and length outside off stump, Hayden shoulders arms and watches it bounce quite a lot through to the wicketkeeper
Oram to Hayden, 1 run Hayden backs away towards the leg side to make room, Oram follows him and bowls it on the pads, Hayden flicks through midwicket
Oram to Hussey, no run pitches on off stump, moves sharply away from Hussey and bounces high too, he lets it go
Gillespie to Hayden, no run good length ball on leg and middle stump, Hayden gets forward and plays it back to the bowler

Gillespie to Hayden, OUT gone! Right after drinks! Gillespie bowls it a touch wider outside off stump, Hayden chases it and plays a half-drive/half-cut, he nicks it straight to Fleming at first slip who takes a simple catch
Gillespie to Hodge, no run defended to point on the back foot
Gillespie to Hodge, no run Gillespie fires in the yorker on off and middle stump, Hodge leans forward and digs it out on the off side
Gillespie to Hodge, no run pitches on a good length outside off stump and cuts into Hodge who gets a stride in and shoulders arms

Gillespie to Hodge, 1 run Hodge tries to defend on the front foot but gets an inside edge on to pad, Hussey sets off for the sharp single and how quick is he! Gillespie tires to kick it on to the stumps but Hussey was home
Oram to Hodge, no run Oram floats it wide outside off stump, that was there for the cut shot if Hodge wanted but he chose not to play a shot
Oram to Hodge, no run pitches on a good length outside off stump, Hodge lets it go again
Oram to Hodge, no run in the tight channel outside off stump, Hodge defends towards cover point, Hussey is interested in the single but Hodge says no
Oram to Hodge, no run defended towards cover on the back foot
Oram to Hodge, 1 run Hodge gets forward and opens the face to play a good length ball down to third man
Oram to Hussey, no run left alone outside the off stump, excellent tight bowling from Oram
Gillespie to Hodge, no run fullish length swinging back into Hodge from outside off stump, he gets his foot outside the line and gets hit on the pad while trying to defend
Gillespie to Hodge, no run in the channel outside off stump and this one goes straight through instead of swinging back into the right-hander, Hodge lets it go
Gillespie to Hodge, 1 run shorter in length and angling into the hips, Hodge plays it towards midwicket and Hussey races through for the single
Gillespie to Hussey, no run Gillespie asks the question but that pitched outside leg stump, Hussey moved forward and across and got hit high on the pad
Gillespie to Hussey, no run defended to midwicket on the front foot
Gillespie to Hussey, no run pitches outside off stump and moves away from Hussey who lets it go, that's the end of the Powerplays, New Zealand have given away just 48 in 20 overs, stunning effort
Oram to Hodge, no run that cut back a long way into Hodge from outside off stump and hit Hodge high on the pad, he was on the back foot but it was too high
Oram to Hodge, no run good length ball outside off stump that bounces sharply and goes straight through to McCullum
Oram to Hodge, 1 run a touch too straight this time, Hodge moves across and dabs it to midwicket for a single
Oram to Hussey, 1 run short of alength ball angling away from Hussey, he moves forward and plays it down to third man, that's Australia's fifty, in the 21st over!
Oram to Hodge, 1 run Hodge gets hit on the pad while pushing forward and Hussey sets off at frantic pace for a run
Oram to Hussey, no run in a tight channel outside Hussey's off stump, left alone to McCullum
Gillespie to Hodge, 1 run played down to fine leg for a single
Gillespie to Hussey, no run good length ball on middle and off stump, Hussey gets on to the front foot and defends

Gillespie to Hussey, no run fuller length on off stump, Hussey drives on the front foot towards cover where there is a small fumble, Hussey stands in the middle of the pitch asking Hodge if he wants the single, Hodge says no
Gillespie to Hussey, no run pitches just outside leg stump and Hussey gets hit on the pad in front of middle stump as he moved forward, Gillespie roars an appeal but that pitched outside leg
Gillespie to Hussey, no run beauty! Gillespie gets one to bounce very sharply from just outside off stump, Hussey gets on the back foot but gets betaen by the bounce
Gillespie to Hussey, no run pushed towards point on the front foot, just the single off the over
Oram to Hodge, 1 run Oram sees Hodge coming down the pitch and bangs it in short, Hodge ends up fending it off his glove on to his thigh
Oram to Hussey, 2 runs Hussey steps down this time and Oram sees him coming again, he bowls it shorter and Hussey gets an inside edge to fine leg
Oram to Hussey, no run pitches on off stump and moves away from Hussey who shoulders arms
Oram to Hussey, no run Hussey advances down the pitch once more and decides not to play a shot at the last moment
Oram to Hussey, no run Hussey tries to pull this time but the length is too full, it hurries on to Hussey who ends up hitting it in the air wide of Oram
Oram to Hussey, no run good length and line outside off stump, Hussey moves his bat out of the way
Gillespie to Hodge, FOUR runs short and wide from Gillespie, Hodge breaks the shackles by standing firm and cutting over point, that was a freebie from gillespie
Gillespie to Hodge, no run defended to point on the back foot
Gillespie to Hodge, no run a touch slower and on off stump, Hodge gets behind the line and defends on the off side

Gillespie to Hodge, no run short of a length ball on off stump, Hodge has no option but to play back in his crease and defend with a straight bat, well he did have other options but this was most advisable
Gillespie to Hodge, no run defended on the back foot back to Gillespie who's come back well after that poor first ball
Gillespie to Hodge, no run fuller ball on off stump, Hodge leans forward and drives to cover, five dot balls after the boundary off the first
Vettori to Hussey, no run angling the ball into a good length from over the wicket, defended towards back ward point, Fleming has four men in the circle on the off side
Vettori to Hussey, no run Hussey tries to drive but gets an inside edge to short fine leg
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run dabbed to Vincent at midwicket for a sharp single
Vettori to Hodge, no run bowled flat and quick on off stump, Hodge plays back and defends
Vettori to Hodge, 1 run fuller and slower through the air this time, Hodge leans across and turns it wide of the man at short fine leg for a single
Vettori to Hussey, no run Hussey lets it go outside the off stump
Tuffey to Hodge, no run loud appeal for lbw, Tuffey cuts that back off the seam a long way into Hodge who got outside the line of off stump and gets hit on the pad
Tuffey to Hodge, no run fuller length on off and middle stump, Hodge closes the face and plays it to midwicket
Tuffey to Hodge, no run defended to square leg of the back foot
Tuffey to Hodge, no run full ball swinging into middle stump, Hodge moves forward and pushes it to mid on

Tuffey to Hodge, 2 runs Hodge comes down the track and tries to slog it over the off side, it was far too wide and Hodge had to reach out for it, he slashes and gets a thick edge to Vettori at third man
Tuffey to Hodge, no run miserly line from Tuffey and the length isn't generous either, Hodge plays back and defends back to the bowler
Vettori to Hussey, no run Vettori drops it short and wide outside off stump, Hussey gets back and cuts straight to point, he'll be disappointed with that
Vettori to Hussey, no run driven to cover on the front foot
Vettori to Hussey, FOUR runs a long hop outside off stump, this time Hussey doesn't miss out, he moves back and cuts through cover point for four, poor ball
Vettori to Hussey, no run Hussey takes a step down to one that's flighted on off stump, he defends on the front foot
Vettori to Hussey, 2 runs streaky stuff, Hussey came down the pitch again and was cramped for room, he plays a drive and the ball hits the edge and flies thorugh where first slip would have been
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run driven through point on the front foot for a single
Tuffey to Hussey, no run Hussey takes a step down again and tries to hit down the ground, he gets more of an inside edge to midwicket
Tuffey to Hussey, 1 run good length ball on middle and off stump, Hussey drops it at his feet with soft hands and Hodge sets off for the single
Tuffey to Hodge, no run short of a length ball outside the off stump, it bounces sharply as well and Hodge lets it go

Tuffey to Hodge, no run dropped! Full ball on off stump, Hodge gets forward and cover-drives on the up, he hits it in the air to McMillan at cover who dives forward, gets both hands to it, but can't hold on
Tuffey to Hodge, 1 run worked off the pads through square leg for a single
Tuffey to Hussey, 3 runs Hussey charges again and lofts over mid-off, there's no one in the deep but he hasn't timed that well at all and the ball pulls up well short of the fence
Styris to Hussey, 1 run short of a length ball on off stump, Hussey waits on the back foot and runs it down to third man
Styris to Hodge, 1 run dabbed with soft hands towards cover for a sharp single, Hussey dives dramatically into his crease at the striker's end but he was home by a long way
Styris to Hussey, no run defended to covers on the front foot
Styris to Hussey, 1 run fuller length on off stump, Hussey leans forward and drives to mid-off
Styris to Hodge, 1 wide Styris fires one down leg side, Hodge moves across and tries to flick but misses, wide called
Styris to Hodge, FOUR runs full and wide outside off stump, Hodge moves on to the front foot, frees his arms and thumps it through cover for four
Styris to Hodge, no run Styris bowls this shorter on off stump, defended on the back foot to the off side
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run tossed up outside off stump, Hussey gets a long stride in and pushes through cover point for one
Vettori to Hodge, no run pitches on off stump, doesn't turn but bounces high, Hodge tries to cut but gets beaten

Vettori to Hodge, OUT Fleming fumbles and then takes it! Hodge tries to cut once again and gets a thick edge on it, it flies quickly at stomach height to Fleming at first slip who doesn't take it cleanly at the first attempt, he manages to grab it as the ball bounces off his palms
Vettori to White, 1 run White gets off the mark by pushing it off the back foot through cover point
Vettori to Hussey, no run beaten! Hussey moves forward and defends but the ball pitches outside off stump and goes straight through after beating the outside edge
Vettori to Hussey, no run defended on the off side on the front foot
Styris to White, no run full ball on leg stump, White leans forward and plays it to mid-on, he should have played that behind square on the leg side but was early on the shot
Styris to White, no run pushed to mid-off on the front foot
Styris to White, 2 runs Styris hits the stumps at the bowler's end while delivering that and slips on to leg stump, White plays it behind square leg for two
Styris to White, no run full and in the blockhole, White defends on the front foot
Styris to White, 1 run short and wide outside off stump, White moves back and cuts to deep point

Styris to Hussey, FOUR runs shot! Hussey is cashing in when he can, Styris bowls one short and Hussey plays another short arm pull over square leg, he played one earlier in his innings too, well-controlled shot
Vettori to White, 1 run cut off the back foot to deep point for a single
Vettori to Hussey, no run tossed up slowly on off stump, Hussey is early in getting on the front foot and gets beaten
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run pushed through midwicket for a single, Vettori slipped on to middle and leg that time
Vettori to White, 1 run too short and wide, White cuts to deep point for one more
Vettori to Hussey, no run slow ball and flighted through at under 80kmh, Hussey steps down and tries to hit on the leg side but was beaten in the flight
Vettori to Hussey, no run flatter and faster this time, Hussey tries to close the face and play it through square leg but misses
McMillan to White, no run full ball on off stump, driven towards cover on the front foot
McMillan to White, 1 run a touch shorter and White uses the width to play it late to short third man

McMillan to Hussey, OUT big big wicket! McMillan bowls on a good length on off stump, Hussey goes for the drive and ends up hitting it on the up to Taylor at cover who dives forward to take a sharp catch, Fleming's decision to use McMillan pays off at once
McMillan to Watson, no run full ball on the pads, clipped off his toes to midwicket
McMillan to Watson, no run Dropped! McCullum was standing up to the stumps and couldn't hold on to an edge as Watson pushed forward and tried to defend
McMillan to Watson, no run defended on the off side on the front foot
Vettori to White, 1 run pushed through quickly on off stump, White pushes it to cover and takes a sharp single
Vettori to Watson, no run floated through on off and middle stump, Watson gets forward and inside edges it on to the pad
Vettori to Watson, no run defended on the front foot on the off side, that was much quicker at 97 kmh
Vettori to Watson, no run slower this time at 84 kmh, Vettori is varying his pace cleverly, Watson defends on the front foot
Vettori to Watson, no run defended to midwicket on the back foot
Vettori to Watson, 1 run Australia finally reach 100 with a push off the pads through midwicket, it's been a real struggle
McMillan to Watson, no run good length ball on off stump, defended on the front foot to the leg side
McMillan to Watson, no run full and straight, Watson plants his foot forward and drives with a straight bat back to McMillan
McMillan to Watson, no run defended solidly on the front foot to the off side
McMillan to Watson, no run good length and a hint of swing back into the right-hander, Watson moves forward and defends to cover
McMillan to Watson, 1 run a little too full on off and middle stump, driven down to long on for a single
McMillan to White, 1 run a touch shorter and White plays that with a flat bat from outside off stump down to long on
Bond to White, no run good length ball on off stump, driven to covers on the front foot
Bond to White, 1 run on the slower side - 135 kmh - on off and middle stump, White moves across and plays it to midwicket for a single
Bond to Watson, 1 run short of a length just outside off stump, Watson moves his foot forward and defends, the ball runs off a thick edge to third man
Bond to White, 1 run short of a length ball on middle and leg, nudged on the leg side for another single
Bond to Watson, no run fuller length from Bond on off stump, Watson plonks his foot forward and defends to cover
Bond to Watson, no run excellent over from bond, finishes up with a short of a length ball on off and middle, Watson defends on the leg side
Vettori to White, 1 run drifts down leg side, clipped off the pads to short fine leg for a single
Vettori to Watson, no run tossed up on off and middle stump, Watson defends on the front foot
Vettori to Watson, no run fuller ball drifting on to middle and leg, Waston hits it off his toes but straight to midwicket
Vettori to Watson, 1 run slightly shorter this time, Watson cuts to deep point on the back foot
Vettori to White, 1 run flighted delivery on off stump, White moves back in his crease and drives to the man on the cover fence
Vettori to Watson, no run defended on the off side on the back foot

Bond to White, OUT You will not see a better caught and bowled! Bond bowls a slower ball full to White who drives back at the bowler, the ball flies low and to the right of Bond who is going the other way on his follow through, he stretches out his right hand and picks up the ball inches off the ground, rolls over and holds on, absolutely stunning catch, pure
Bond to Hogg, no run defended on the back foot
Bond to Hogg, no run left alone through to McCullum, Hogg sways out of the way of that short one
Bond to Hogg, no run defended on the back foot to the off side
Bond to Hogg, FOUR runs short of a length and wide outside of fstump, Hogg cuts and cuts well, he beats the in field and gets four for that
Bond to Hogg, no run clipped off his toes through square leg
Vettori to Watson, no run tossed up on off stump, Watson moves forward and defends
Vettori to Watson, no run fuller ball on off and middle, driven to mid-on off the front foot
Vettori to Watson, no run defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Vettori to Watson, no run Vettori bowls this from wide of the crease, defended on the off stump
Vettori to Watson, no run he's going very wide of the crease to create an angle into the right-hander, defended on the front foot
Vettori to Watson, no run closer to the stumps this time, Vettori bowls it slower and on off stump, Watson drives it back to him, Vettori finishes a maiden over
Oram to Hogg, 1 run pushed off the back foot to point for a risky single, had Taylor hit from point, Hogg might have struggled
Oram to Watson, 2 runs good length ball angling into Watson from over the wicket, Watson edges it down to third man off the back foot
Oram to Watson, no run good length ball cuts back into Watson's off stump, defended on the front foot towards cover
Oram to Watson, 1 run drifting on to middle and leg stump this time, played off the hips to fine leg
Oram to Hogg, 1 run Oram drags that short and Hogg moves back to swat it away through square leg for a single
Oram to Watson, no run tight line and length on off stump, Watson gets pinned on the back foot and defends with a straight bat
Vettori to Hogg, no run pitches just outside off stump and spins into Hogg who plays it off the back foot back to the bowler
Vettori to Hogg, no run left alone outside the off stump
Vettori to Hogg, 1 run width offered outside off stump and Hogg cuts past point for a single
Vettori to Watson, 1 run tossed up on off and middle, Watson charges down and takes it on the full, he drives past Vettori for the single
Vettori to Hogg, 1 run played to the man on the cover fence for one more

Vettori to Watson, OUT Bond takes the catch at long-off! Watson gives Vettori the charge and doesn't connect well, he gets a lot of height on it but not enough distance, Bond runs in from the fence at long-off and takes a well-judged catch
Oram to Johnson, no run good length ball on off stump, Johnson plays back and defends on the off side
Oram to Johnson, no run defended on the off side once again off the back foot
Oram to Johnson, no run fuller length on off stump, Johnson plays back in his crease and pushes it towards cover
Oram to Johnson, no run Oram is keeping it tight on off stump, Johnson once more plays it off the back foot back to the bowler
Oram to Johnson, no run lovely ball, a bit quicker and fuller, pitching on off stump and cutting away from Johnson who tries to drive on the back foot and gets beaten
Oram to Johnson, FOUR runs excellent shot! full ball on the pads and Johnson flicks it neatly off his toes over midwicket, he's timed that well enough to beat the dive on the fence
Vettori to Hogg, no run defended on the front foot to the off side
Vettori to Hogg, 1 run slightly shorter in length, cut off the back foot to point
Vettori to Johnson, no run flighted delivery on off stump, Johnson gets a stride in and defends
Vettori to Johnson, 1 run that was the straighter one and Johnson didn't pick it, he got an outside edge behind point
Vettori to Hogg, 2 runs driven to deep cover for two more
Vettori to Hogg, no run tossed up delivery wide outside off stump, Hogg tries to go on the back foot and cut but gets beaten
Oram to Johnson, no run pushed towards cover point on the back foot
Oram to Johnson, no run dabbed short on the leg side for a sharp single, oops no, they decide against it
Oram to Johnson, no run pitches on off stump and seams away from the left-hander who gets beaten, McCullum fumbles once, fumbles twice and then takes it
Oram to Johnson, no run Johnson once again swishes at it outside the off stump and gets beaten
Oram to Johnson, no run short of a length on off stump, Johnson waits on the back foot and plays it to point
Oram to Johnson, 1 run fuller ball on off and middle, Johnson pushes it down to long on for a single, Oram completes a fine spell, just 22 runs off his ten overs.
Gillespie to Johnson, 1 run a touch too short on middle and off, Johnson swings it through midwicket for a single
Gillespie to Hogg, 1 run the yorker fired into leg stump, Hogg backs away and pushes it to cover where Styris makes a fine save but can't prevent the single
Gillespie to Johnson, 1 run Johnson tries to loft over cover and the ball hit the toe end of the bat and loops over Styris's head at cover
Gillespie to Hogg, 1 run full and in the blockhole on leg stump once more, Hogg backs away and drives to long on for a single
Gillespie to Johnson, no run Gillespie bowls a full toss outside off stump, Johnson lines it up and tries to send it out of the ground, he misses it completely and the ball passes close to off stump

Gillespie to Johnson, OUT and another one goes, Gillespie bowls a slower ball on leg stump, Johnson moves across and tries to flick, he gets a leading edge that lobs tamely to Oram running in from long-on
Bond to Bracken, no run defended towards cover on the front foot
Bond to Bracken, no run short of a length ball outside off stump, Bracken moves back in his crease and punches to cover
Bond to Bracken, no run in the corridor outside off stump, Bracken moves back and lets it go
Bond to Bracken, OUT Bond lets a yorker rip, but it's a slower ball, Bracken backs away and tries to squeeze it on the off side, he misses and Bond hits the stumps, Australia are in shambles
Bond to McGrath, no run full and straight, McGrath misses it and the ball almost shaves off stump
Bond to McGrath, 2 runs full toss on leg stump, McGrath tries to play it through square leg but gets a leading edge through point
Oram to Hodge, no run short of a length ball just outside the off stump, defended on the front foot towards cover
Oram to Hodge, no run good length once again, Hodge moves on to the front foot and pushes it to cover
Oram to Hodge, no run pitches just outside off stump and holds it line, Hodge lifts his bat out of the way and lets it go to McCullum
Oram to Hodge, no run this one jags back into Hodge from outside off stump, he gets cramped for room and plays it on the off side
Oram to Hodge, 1 run pitches on off stump and drifts on to middle and leg stump, Hodge turns it off his pads for a single
Oram to Hussey, no run defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Gillespie to Hodge, no run pitches just outside off stump and goes straight through to McCullum, Hodge is happy to let it go
Gillespie to Hodge, no run good length ball on off stump, giving Hodge nothing to work with whatsoever, he moves forward and defends towards cover
Gillespie to Hodge, no run what a ripper, the effort ball bursts off a good length and takes Hodge by surprise, he fends at it and the ball whizzes past the edge
Gillespie to Hodge, 1 run shorter in length and wider too, Hodge slaps it to deep backward point for single
Gillespie to Hussey, no run good length ball angling across Hussey from over the wicket, Hussey lets it go, he has scored just one run in the last nine overs
Gillespie to Hussey, no run tight line and length, this one came back into Hussey's middle stump from outside off, defended on the front foot towards cover
Gillespie to Hogg, 1 run full toss on middle and leg stump, Hogg backs away and hits it down to long on for one
Gillespie to McGrath, 1 wide Gillespie bowls a bouncer but it is mis-directed down leg side, wide called
Gillespie to McGrath, no run short of a length ball on off stump, McGrath chops it down towards point
Gillespie to McGrath, 1 leg bye fuller ball on the pads, McGrath tries to flick but misses and gets hit on the pad
Gillespie to Hogg, no run fuller ball on middle and leg, Hogg swings it to midwicket
Gillespie to Hogg, 1 run full ball outside off stump, Hogg swats it down to long off for a single

Gillespie to McGrath, 2 runs slower ball on off stump, McGrath hits in hard into the ground and over the bowler, he runs one and the throw hits the stumps at the batsman's end, they run an over throw and since the stumps have already been broken, there's not much danger in going for the second
Bond to Hogg, FOUR runs full toss outside off stump, Hogg smashes it and places it well through cover, he'll get four for that and Australia move closer to 150
Bond to Hogg, (no ball) 1 run a full toss above waist height, Hogg edges it in the air and down to third man, Taylor takes the catch at third man but it was a no-ball above waist
Bond to McGrath, 1 run inside-edged to square leg for a single
Bond to Hogg, OUT Bond bowls the slower ball on middle stump, Hogg moves towards the off side and tries to run it past short fine leg, he misses and the ball hits wood, Bond finishes with five for 23

Bond led New Zealand's outstanding effort in the field. He now has 33 wickets in 10 ODIs at a staggering 13.12 apiece against them. Australia never lost a clutch of wickets together but they were just unable to score. The target of 149 may seem small on paper but conditions are not easy for batting and Australia will fight tooth and nail. Join me in about 35 minutes

We're moments away from New Zealand's chase. They need 149 runs to win at nearly three runs an over. Stephen Fleming and Lou Vincent are New Zealand's openers. Shane Bond and Daryl Tuffey got plenty of assistance from the pitch; expect Glenn McGrath to get the same. He's bowling from over the wicket with two slips in place.
McGrath to Vincent, no run hits a good length wide outside off stump and the ball seams sharply away from Vincent off the pitch, he lets it go
McGrath to Vincent, 1 run closer to the stumps this time, Vincent gets forward and dabs it to mid-off for a single, good sharp call

McGrath to Fleming, no run wonderful ball and well left by Fleming, that pitched just outside off stump and cut back into Fleming's off stump, he gets his front foot forward, judges the bounce well and lets it go
McGrath to Fleming, 1 run Fleming gets forward to one that is on a good length on off stump, he pushes it to covers and Vincent sets off in a flash for a single
McGrath to Vincent, no run excellent ball, that hit a good length just outside off stump and took off, Vincent prodded tentatively at it and got beaten by the bounce and the seam movement
McGrath to Vincent, 1 run drifts on to middle and leg, Vincent tucks it off his pads through midwicket for another very quick single
Bracken to Vincent, no run good length on off stump, angling across Vincent who gets forward and is hit on the pad
Bracken to Vincent, 1 run once again Vincent drops it short of mid-off with soft hands and Fleming responds superbly to his call for a single, the running has been alert so far
Bracken to Fleming, no run pitches on off and seams away from Fleming very late, he gets drawn into a front foot defence and the ball misses the edge
Bracken to Fleming, no run lovely stuff, a fraction slower than the previous ball but exactly the same line and length, Fleming once again tried to defend on the front foot but got beaten

Bracken to Fleming, 2 runs Fleming takes a step down and tries to hoick it to square leg, he is early on the shot and the seam movement away from him induces the leading edge that flies high and safe over cover point
Bracken to Fleming, no run Fleming flashes outside the off stump and gets beaten once again, the wicketkeeper doesn't appeal but everyone esle asks the question
McGrath to Vincent, 1 run Dropped! Vincent hammers a fullish ball right back at McGrath, that was hit off the bottom of the bat and McGrath reached out to his left but couldn
McGrath to Fleming, 1 run dabbed towards point for another quick single
McGrath to Vincent, no run pitches on a good length outside off stump and seams away from Vincent who lets it go

McGrath to Vincent, FOUR runs Vincent goes after McGrath, he picks the line outside off stump and although the length wasn't there to play the drive Vincent managed to loft it over mid-off, he didn't time that well and the ball trickles over the fence
McGrath to Vincent, no run pitches outside off stump and cuts back into Vincent who gets forward and pushes it towards point

McGrath to Vincent, FOUR runs smack, take that says Vincent! McGrath drops it a fraction short and Vincent pulls it high over mid-on, the ball reaches the boundary on just the one bounce, New Zealand have come out firing
Bracken to Fleming, no run defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Bracken to Fleming, no run pitches outside off stump and Fleming sees the width on offer and chases it, the ball moves away off the pitch and beats the expansive drive
Bracken to Fleming, no run lovely stuff from Bracken, that pitches on off stump, forcing Fleming to play at it, and them cuts away from him and beats the outside edge
Bracken to Fleming, no run this one comes in with the angle of the arm and Fleming moves across his stumps and gets hit on the pad
Bracken to Fleming, 2 runs too full outside off stump from Bracken, Fleming gets on the front foot and pushes it in front of point, McGrath runs around from third man and does the fielding
Bracken to Fleming, no run good line and length on off stump, Fleming gets behind the ball and defends on the off side on the front foot
McGrath to Vincent, (no ball) McGrath over-steps, Vincent gets forward and defends towards cover
McGrath to Vincent, no run hits a good line and length outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
McGrath to Vincent, 1 run fuller length outside the off stump, Vincent gets forward and opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man
McGrath to Fleming, no run pitches on middle and angles across towards Fleming's off stump, he gets on to the front foot and blocks towards mid-off
McGrath to Fleming, no run pitches wide outside off stump and moves further away from Fleming who shoulders arms
McGrath to Fleming, no run short of alength ball and it bounces high on Fleming who stands on his toes and plays it down back to McGrath
McGrath to Fleming, no run pitches on off stump and seams away from Fleming who pushes at it and gets beaten
Bracken to Vincent, 2 runs Vincent charges Bracken and lofts him over extra cover, he didn't make proper contact but the ball manages to fall safe out of Watson's reach
Bracken to Vincent, 1 leg bye pitches on a good length and nips back into Vincent who gets hit on the pad

Bracken to Fleming, no run close call that, Fleming trying to leave a ball outside off stump but was very late in pulling his bat out of the way, the ball hits the bat and goes to Haddin on the bounce
Bracken to Fleming, no run good length ball angling into off and middle, Fleming leans across and gets hit on the pad
Bracken to Fleming, no run Bracken appeals confidently for lbw, that pitched outside off stump, Fleming walked across his stumps and got hit on the pad perhaps outside the line of off stump
Bracken to Fleming, FOUR runs Bracken drops it short and Fleming uses the room to free his arms and lash it over point, that bounces once before reaching the fence
McGrath to Vincent, no run played to point off the back foot
McGrath to Vincent, no run oh my my, that pitched on off stump and cut into Vincent, he let that go and the ball flies just over the top of middle stump, lucky leave or well-judged leave?
McGrath to Vincent, 1 run inside-edged down to fine leg for a single, Vincent was looking to hit that down the ground
McGrath to Fleming, no run brilliant from McGrath, he pitched that on a good length on off stump and drew Fleming out of his crease, he prodded at that and the ball seamed away from the bat
McGrath to Fleming, no run identical ball on off stump, this time Fleming lets it go outside the off stump
McGrath to Fleming, 2 runs fuller length on middle and off stump, Fleming leans forward and forces it through midwicket, he's placed that well and will get two for it
Bracken to Vincent, no run Bracken pitches it on off stump and seams it away from Vincent a long way, Vincent lets that go, Bracken is getting tonnes of seam movement
Bracken to Vincent, no run this one is much straighter on off stump, Vincent gets on to the front foot and defends towards cover
Bracken to Vincent, 1 run this one pitches outside leg stump and goes on towards leg and middle, Vincent tries to defend and gets an inside edge on to pad
Bracken to Fleming, no run excellent length from Bracken, and the line is just outside off stump, Fleming moves forward and towards the ball but decides to let it go
Bracken to Fleming, 1 run that was just short of a length and close to off stump, Fleming moves back and even though there isn't much room, he manages to cut it wide of point for a single
Bracken to Vincent, 1 run Vincent defends on the front foot but an inside edge goes towards square leg for a single
McGrath to Vincent, no run Vincent backs away and tries to hit it through the off side, he gets a bottom edge to mid-on

McGrath to Vincent, no run Australia fluff a run-out chance, Vincent dabs it to point and sets off for a signle, Phil Jaques runs to his right, picks up, transfers the ball to his throwing hand, turns around and throws at the striker's end, the throw was poor and Haddin wasn't in position
McGrath to Vincent, no run left alone outside off stump
McGrath to Vincent, no run pitches outside off stump and seams back into Vincent who lets it go through to Haddin

McGrath to Vincent, no run this one moves away from Vincent who got on the front foot playing for theball that was coming back into him, the ball beats the edge and Vincent moves his bat out of the way as an afterthought
McGrath to Vincent, no run defended on the off side on the back foot
Bracken to Fleming, no run fullish ball on off stump angling into Fleming who gets forward and tries to drive but ends up inside-edging it to square leg
Bracken to Fleming, FOUR runs outstanding shot, Fleming gets forward to one that's a little shorter and crashes it through point, he's timed that well enough to get four
Bracken to Fleming, no run once again he dgets forward and plays the drive but hits it to cover this time
Bracken to Fleming, FOUR runs Fleming moves across his stumps and picks a full length ball from off stump and flicks it behind square on the leg side, excellent improvisation and that's four runs

Bracken to Fleming, SIX runs full and wide outside off stump, Fleming gets forward and throws his bat at it, the ball hits the outside edge and flies high and over the third man fence! When you slash, slash hard.
Bracken to Fleming, no run defended on the front foot back to the bowler
McGrath to Vincent, no run good length ball on off stump, defended on the front foot towards cover
McGrath to Vincent, no run pitches short of a length outside off stump and moves away from Vincent who lets it go
McGrath to Vincent, no run great line and length, just outside off stump and has Vincent in two minds, whether to play at it or not, he ends up doing a bit of both and gets beaten
McGrath to Vincent, FOUR runs drifts on to middle and leg, Vincent moves across and flicks it from middle to fine leg, Watson is very square on the fence and can't stop it from reaching the fence
McGrath to Vincent, no run defended towards cover on the front foot
McGrath to Vincent, 1 run that's not short and all but Vincent gets on to the back foot and pulls it wide of mid on for a single
Bracken to Vincent, no run defended on the leg side off the back foot
Bracken to Vincent, no run pitches on a good length on off stump, Vincent gets drawn forward and the ball moves sharply away off the surface and beats the outside edge
Bracken to Vincent, no run good length ball on off stump, Vincent pushes forward and gets hit on the pad while on the move, Bracken appeals for lbw but that was missing off stump
Bracken to Vincent, no run how did that miss off stump? It pitched on leg and middle, squared Vincent up and seamed away from him almost brushing the off stump
Bracken to Vincent, no run short of a length ball on middle and off, Vincent gets forward and gets hit on the thigh
Bracken to Vincent, no run pitches on off stump, Vincent sees the length is fuller and tries to drive, he gets beaten by the seam movement away from him
Johnson to Fleming, 1 run full length ball on off and middle stump, Fleming gets forward and drives with a very straight bat, Johnson gets his hand to it or else that would have been four
Johnson to Vincent, no run the attempted yorker finishes as a half-volley on leg stump, Vincent flicks and connects well, he hits it to square leg
Johnson to Vincent, 2 leg byes Vincent tries to flick again but gets hit on the pad for leg byes towards short fine leg
Johnson to Vincent, no run short of a length ball on middle and off stump, Vincent moves on to the front foot and defends on the off side
Johnson to Vincent, 1 run too full outside off stump, Vincent gets forward and hammers the off-drive, White runs to his left at mid-off, dives full length and saves three runs
Johnson to Fleming, 1 run short of a length ball outside off stump, Fleming moves back and cuts past point
Bracken to Fleming, no run good length ball angling into Fleming's off stump from over the wicket, defended on the front foot towards point
Bracken to Fleming, no run and Bracken beats the edge, that pitches on off stump and shapes away from Fleming who prods forward, Australia need to hit the edge now
Bracken to Fleming, 2 runs Fleming jumps down the track and lofts Bracken straight down the ground, that's gone very high in the air and it stops dead after bouncing in the outfield
Bracken to Fleming, no run good length ball outside the off stump, Felming leans across and plays it towards cover point
Bracken to Fleming, no run driven back to Bracken on the front foot, the ball hits the stumps at the non-striker's end but Vincent is in no danger
Bracken to Fleming, no run Fleming moves forward and across, trying to force it through the leg side, he gets beaten and the ball hits the pad outside the line of off stump

Johnson to Vincent, FOUR runs superb stroke from Vincent, he sees that it's full and wide and plays a controlled cover-drive perfectly through the infield for foure more, New Zealand are ticking along with ease
Johnson to Vincent, no run left alone outside the off stump
Johnson to Vincent, no run good length ball on middle and off stump, Vincent gets on to the front foot and nudges it to midwicket

Johnson to Vincent, FOUR runs whack! Stand and deliver! Vincent picks up the short length early and uses the room outside off stump to free his arms and blast it over covers for the second boundary in the over
Johnson to Vincent, no run defended to point on the front foot
Johnson to Vincent, 1 run he's going for broke now is Vincent! He plants his front foot forward and tries to hit that through the off side, the thick top edge flies down to third man
Watson to Vincent, 1 run pitches on off and holds its line, Vincent pushes forward and plays it towards cover for a single
Watson to Fleming, no run Watson strays on the fuller side and Fleming gets forward and drives with the full face of the bat to mid-off
Watson to Fleming, 1 run Watson bowls it short this time and Fleming swivels and pulls it over midwicket, Hussey has a man out there on the fence
Watson to Vincent, FOUR runs and the edge flies exactly where he would have been! Talk about bad luck! Vincent edges it wide of Haddin and fine enough to reach the fence

Watson to Vincent, SIX runs Waston bowls this one full and on middle and off stump, Vincent stands his ground and hits through the line, it's timed with awesome power and the ball sails over the straight boundary
Watson to Vincent, no run defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Johnson to Fleming, no run good length ball seaming away from Fleming who pushes tentatively at it and gets beaten
Johnson to Fleming, 1 run short of a length ball on off and middle, Fleming moves across and plays it to square leg
Johnson to Vincent, no run pitches on a good length and bounces high through to Haddin, Vincent judges the bounce well and lets it go
Johnson to Vincent, no run pitches outside off stump and moves wider away from Vincent who lets it go to Haddin

Johnson to Vincent, no run Australia are in shambles! Vincent tries to pull the ball but ends up sking it high in the air, no one calls for the catch and the ball falls safe in the region of short mid-on, unbelieveable stuff, Vincent had turned his back and was walking off because he thought he was a goner
Johnson to Vincent, FOUR runs he's smashed that, Johnson bowls a short ball and Vincent rocks on to the back foot and pulls it powerfully to the square leg fence
Watson to Fleming, 1 run flicked through midwicket for a single
Watson to Vincent, 1 run fullish ball on off stump, Vincent gets forward and drives to McGrath at mid-off for a single
Watson to Fleming, 1 run good length ball angling across Fleming who gets forward and drives towards mid-on, the inside edge takes the ball through midwicket
Watson to Vincent, 1 run Vincent reaches 50 by running a ball off the outside edge down to third man, he's been in superb nick ever since he replaced Astle in the team, Wellington cheers him on
Watson to Fleming, no run defended towards cover on the back foot

Watson to Fleming, no run short of a length delivery outside off stump, Fleming gets on to the front foot and realises he isn't in good position to play the drive, he takes the bottom hand off the bat and drives to mid-off
Johnson to Vincent, no run good length ball on off stump, Vincent gets on to the front foot and drives back to Johnson
Johnson to Vincent, no run pitches on a good length on off stump and angles away from the right-hander, left alone by Vincent
Johnson to Vincent, 1 run excellent line and length and superb running, Vincent plays that with soft hands towards mid-off and they complete the single easily
Johnson to Fleming, no run Fleming latches on to a short and wide one and drives firmly to cover

Johnson to Fleming, no run beaten outside the off stump, Johnson is generating good pace and appreciable movemnt but just not hitting the edge, and when he did find the top edge, no one called for the catch
Johnson to Fleming, no run short and wide outside the off stump, Fleming slashes and misses
Watson to Vincent, no run full length outside the off stump, Vincent gets on to the front foot and drives tro mid-off
Watson to Vincent, no run defended towards cover on the front foot
Watson to Vincent, 1 run Vincent throws his bat at a fullish delivery outside off stump, he wanted to hit that down the ground but the ball hit the splice of the bat and flew to deep point
Watson to Fleming, no run Fleming wanted to hit that over midwicket but changed his mind at the last moment and defended it towards cover
Watson to Fleming, no run good length ball on off stump angling away from Fleming who pushes forward and gets beaten
Watson to Fleming, no run full length ball on middle and off stump, Fleming moves forward and across and drives to mid-on
Johnson to Vincent, 1 run Johnson angles it wide outside Vincent's off stump, he tires to hit it through extra cover but mis-hits it to mid-off
Johnson to Fleming, no run Fleming gets on to the front foot and drives to cover, that was in the air but fell well short of the fielder
Johnson to Fleming, 1 run short of a length ball on off stump, Fleming gets forward and defends, he gets a thick bottom edge back past the stumps and Vincent calls him through for a single

Johnson to Vincent, 1 run dropped! Vincent slashes hard at one outside the off stump, the thick edge flies to the right of Haddin who dives with one hand, he gets to it well enough but the ball bounced off the glove
Johnson to Fleming, no run defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Johnson to Fleming, FOUR runs sublime stroke, Fleming leans forward and drives past the bowler, past mid-off and the ball speeds to the fence
Watson to Vincent, 1 run pitches on off and angles into middle and leg stump, Vincent moves across and clips it through square leg for one
Watson to Fleming, no run good length ball on off stump, Fleming gets forward and defends on the off side
Watson to Fleming, SIX runs Fleming pulls for six, he used Watson's pace and just swivelled and slammed it over the deep backward square leg fence
Watson to Fleming, no run defended on the front foot back to the bowler

Watson to Fleming, FOUR runs Fleming leans forward and lofts Watson over the off side for four, he reaches his fifty now, sorry I jumped the gun a little, thought he had got to fifty with that six! He's played a superb knock
Watson to Fleming, no run that one keeps a little low and Haddin collects it outside the off stump
Johnson to Vincent, no run pitches wide outside off stump and moves further away from Vincent who lets it go
Johnson to Vincent, no run in the channel outside off stump again, Vincent lets it go
Johnson to Vincent, 1 run much straighter this time on off and middle stump, pushed through midwicket on the front foot
Johnson to Fleming, 3 runs Fleming creamed that back past the bowler, it hit the stumps at the bowler's end and the ball still bounces far enough for the batsmen to run three
Johnson to Vincent, no run left alone outside the off stump by Vincent
Johnson to Vincent, 1 wide short and wide outside the off stump, too wide says Billy Bowden, Johnson is unhappy and that is indeed a harsh call
Johnson to Vincent, 1 run pitching on leg and middle, Vincent chips it to midwicket for a single to end the over
Hogg to Vincent, 1 run full ball on off stump, Vincent gets forward and drives through covers for a single
Hogg to Fleming, 2 runs full toss on leg stump, Fleming gets forward and plays it wide of the man at short fine leg, he didn't time it well enough, he should have hit it for four
Hogg to Fleming, 1 wide slips down leg side, wide called
Hogg to Fleming, no run defended on the front foot on the leg side
Hogg to Fleming, FOUR runs Fleming spots the tossed up delivery and heaves across the line, he beats the man at midwicket and once he's done that it's four all the way
Hogg to Fleming, no run driven down the ground to long on for one
Hogg to Fleming, 1 run
Johnson to Fleming, no run fuller ball on off and middle, Fleming plays it through midwicket
Johnson to Fleming, 1 run whipped down to deep backward square leg for a single
Johnson to Vincent, no run short of a length ball on leg and middle, Vincent gets on to the front foot and defends to midwicket

Johnson to Vincent, 1 run Johnson bowls the bouncer and Vincent is late in getting out of the way, he leavs his bat sticking out and the ball hits the edge and flies down to third man, he nearly got four for it
Johnson to Fleming, no run fuller ball on off stump, Fleming gets on to the front foot and drives to cover
Johnson to Fleming, FOUR runs full and on the pads, Fleming leans forward and clips it off his pads down to the fine leg fence, the proverbial bread and butter
Hogg to Vincent, no run defended on the front foot on the leg side
Hogg to Vincent, 2 runs played fine down to fine leg for a couple of runs
Hogg to Vincent, no run bowled flat but slower through the air outside off stump, Vincent gets across and tries to flick but misses
Hogg to Vincent, 1 run driven down to long on for a single

Hogg to Fleming, FOUR runs Flemign comes down the pitch, takes the ball on the full and chips it in the air and in the gap at deep midwicket, that wasn't very well controlled but the placement was perfect
Hogg to Fleming, no run full ball on the pads, flicked to Hussey at midwicket
Johnson to Vincent, no run fuller length on middle and off stump, driven to midwicket on the front foot
Johnson to Vincent, FOUR runs Vincent smashes a short and wide ball through point for four more, just eight needed now
Johnson to Vincent, 1 run fuller length on middle and off stump, Vincent pushes it to mid-off and runs a quick single
Johnson to Fleming, 1 run drifts on to leg stump and Fleming clips it off his pads to deep backward square leg
Johnson to Vincent, no run Johnson fires in short and Vincent takes his eyes off the ball and turns his back on it, it thuds into his back
Johnson to Vincent, SIX runs Vincent does it with panache! He picks a fullish delivery on off and middle and swings it over square leg for a flat and powerful six, New Zealand have hammered Australia

Shane Bond is the obvious choice for the Man of the Match. He bowled superbly right through and returned figures of 5 for 23. I've enjoyed bringing today's game to you. Keep a watch on Cricinfo for updates on Oram's finger. Thank you for all your emails and do join us on Sunday for the second ODI at Auckland. This is George Binoy signing off. Cheers!

Here's another interesting fact, if Australia go on to lose the Chappell-Hadlee series, South Africa will move ahead of them as the No 1 ranked team on ODIs. It will be the first time Australia have been dethroned since the ratings were introduced by the ICC in 2002.

The New Zealand bowlers - Shane Bond in particular - made a difficult pitch look unplayable. The Australian batsmen were very subdued and didn't build any momentum. Lou Vincent and Stephen Fleming batted aggressively from the start of the chase and that made a lot of difference.

It's been 22 years since New Zealand last had an opening-stand of over hundred against Australia. Australia have been defeated by ten wickets for the first time in ODI history today. They were missing five key players - Ponting, Gilchrist, Clarke, Lee and Symonds - but they have been humiliated.
New Zealand won by 10 wickets (with 138 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Shane Bond, NZ
